title: Calories in Cheesecake Factory Menu Items
meta_description: Discover calories in cheesecake factory menu items like Original Cheesecake (707 kcal per slice), plus macros, variations, and nutrition for popular dishes.
h1: Calories in Cheesecake Factory Menu Items
assumptions: Standard 1 slice of Original Cheesecake (~155 g); menu values based on official data where available; other items vary by recipe and portion.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by specific menu item, portion size, customizations, and preparation. Check Cheesecake Factory's official nutrition guide for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: A slice of Original Cheesecake from the Cheesecake Factory menu has 707 kcal, with high fat and sugar content.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison with menu labels.

faqs.q: How many calories in a slice of Cheesecake Factory Original Cheesecake?
What are calories in Cheesecake Factory pasta dishes?
faqs.a: Varies; e.g., Chicken Madeira is ~1,300 kcal per serving.

faqs.q: Calories in Cheesecake Factory salad menu items?
faqs.a: Factory Chopped Salad is around 1,150 kcal with dressing.

faqs.q: How calorie-dense are Cheesecake Factory burgers?
faqs.a: A burger like the Factory Burger is about 1,260 kcal.

faqs.q: Are there low-calorie options on the Cheesecake Factory menu?
faqs.a: Yes, like SkinnyLicious items (e.g., Tuscan Chicken under 600 kcal).
